name: Slime Run (gjnmbm)
description:
Controls: Press UP on the keyboard to jump.

UP is also a shortcut to start and replay the game if you don't want to click the actual button in order to play or replay it. 

The font used in the game is called Cherry Blue by Four Lines.

This game is basically a clone of the offline Google dino runner game. You can play it in your browser, on a Windows device, or an Android device, if you wish. 

This is the second game I've ever made to completion.

I hope you enjoy it!
